name: Operation swat
description: Ever wanted to be a part of a swat team, Where your mission is to rescue hostages? Well now you can be. You and your team of 3, Which you command are a 24/7 emergency swat team.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: i3 Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: i3 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. Storage: 12 GB available space
